Name: Manama
Description: Manama (Arabic: المنامة, transliteration: al-Manāma) is the capital and largest city of Bahrain with an approximate population of 157,000 people, roughly a quarter of the country's population.

Name: Hamad Town
Description: Hamad Town, or Madinat Hamad, is a commuter town in the Northern Governorate of Bahrain.

Name: Isa Town
Description: Isa Town is in Bahrain. It is famous for the traditional marketplace.

Name: Muharraq
Description: Muharraq is a metropolitan area in Bahrain, an island connected to the northeast of the capital of Manama.

Name: Riffa
Description: Riffa is the second largest city in Bahrain.

Name: Sitrah
Description: Sitra (A.K.A. Sitrah) is a town on Sitra island split between the South Governorate and the Capital Governorate in Bahrain. Here's some information on it if you are planning to go here on your next visit.

Name: Jufair
Description: Manama (Arabic: المنامة, transliteration: al-Manāma) is the capital and largest city of Bahrain with an approximate population of 157,000 people, roughly a quarter of the country's population.

Name: Hawar Islands
Description: The Hawar Islands are in Bahrain, southeast of the main island near Qatar.
